titles.title: Strengthening Enforcement for Health Care Fraud Crimes Act of 2009
A bill to provide increased penalties for health care fraud.
Strengthening Enforcement for Health Care Fraud Crimes Act of 2009

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: Strengthening Enforcement for Health Care Fraud Crimes Act of 2009 - Amends the federal criminal code to revise the elements of the crime of health care fraud and impose a mandatory minimum penalty of six months imprisonment for losses of $100,000 or more resulting from such fraud.
